original_text: But when Paul was about to open his mouth, Gallio said to the Jews, “If it were a matter of wrongdoing or vicious crime, O Jews, I would have reason to accept your complaint.
korean_text: 바울이 입을 열고자 할 때에 갈리오가 유대인들에게 이르되 너희 유대인들아 만일 이것이 무슨 부정한 일이나 불량한 행동이었으면 내가 너희 말을 들어 주는 것이 옳거니와

sentences.original_text: But when Paul was about to open his mouth,
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 바울이 입을 열려고 할 때에,

sentences.original_text: If it were a matter of wrongdoing or vicious crime,
sentences.korean_translation: 만일 어떤 불법이나 악한 행위가 문제라면,

sentences.original_text: I would have reason to accept your complaint.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희의 고소를 받아들일 이유가 있었을 것이다.
